description.narrative: Danida Innovation & Business Explorer (DIBE) offers financial support to Danish companies, including start-ups, that wish to investigate concrete business opportunities contributing to the achievement of the Sustainable Development Goals and the Paris agreement. The scope of the project is to build a Tilapia & Catfish hatchery to produce and supply quality and diseases free fingerlings (baby fish) to the Ijebu-Ode Fish Farm Community in Ogun State Nigeria, under the IJEBU DEVELOPMENT INITIATIVE ON POVERTY REDUCTION (IDIPR), a local NGO supporting small scale farming in the Ijebu area. The Fish Farm community counts +1200 small hold farmers. A major challenge for the small hold farmers to grow their business, is the availability of quality fingerlings as they mostly rely on simple ‘back yard’ bred fingerlings with poor growth potential. Together with a local partner we intent to establish a hatchery, import new genetic strings, and breed a better performing fish to the small hold farmers. Which will be extremely attractive to them, and a key factor to grow their business and create further employment in the community.
The scope of the project is to build a Tilapia & Catfish hatchery to produce and supply quality and diseases free fingerlings (baby fish) to the Ijebu-Ode Fish Farm Community in Ogun State Nigeria,
